Package com.tailf.ncs.alarmman.consumer

The Alarm Manager produces package provides support for subscription of alarms into the NCS Alarm list.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AlarmSourceCentralMBean
    This is the JMX interface for the AlarmSourceCentral class
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlarmSource
    This class establishes a listener queue for emitted alarms.
    AlarmSourceCentral
    The consuming part of the Alarm API.

Package com.tailf.ncs.alarmman.consumer Description

The Alarm Manager produces package provides support for subscription of alarms into the NCS Alarm list. Example 1: Subscription of alarm 

            // Load the schema - needed by

            Socket maapiSocket = new Socket("127.0.0.1",Conf.NCS_PORT);
            Maapi maapi = new Maapi(maapiSocket);
            maapi.loadSchemas();

            // Set up a CDB socket
            Socket socket = new Socket("127.0.0.1",Conf.NCS_PORT);
            Cdb cdb = new Cdb("my-alarm-source-socket", socket);

            // Get and start alarm source - this must only be done once per JVM
            source = AlarmSourceCentral.getAlarmSource(100000, cdb);

            source.start();

            // Collect subscribed alarms.
            Alarm alarm = mySource.takeAlarm();

            while (alarm != null){
                System.out.println(alarm);

                for (Attribute attr: lAlarm.getCustomAttributes()){
                    System.out.println(attr);
                }

                alarm = mySource.takeAlarm();
            }
